childMarkdownRemark.html: As a B2B2X platform, Solaris is always a neutral partner and never competes for customers. All products are adapted to the brand design of our partners.
Our platform approach ensures fast and easy product customization, resulting in superb customer-centric financial features with minimal time-to-market.
Integrate financial services into your product landscape and increase customer loyalty with this service. Financial features that are customized are the perfect add-on to be remembered as a brand.

svg.content: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="48" height="48" viewBox="0 0 48 48"><g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke-width="2"><path stroke="#020203" d="m1.44 8.44 19.11-4.56c2.23-.59 4.54-.59 6.77 0l19.12 4.56M25 13v26m15-26v26M9 13v26"/><path stroke="#1B2230" d="M1 45h46"/></g></svg>

childMarkdownRemark.html: With our German banking license and additional EMI licenses, we can operate in all EU countries and the UK. We always take care of all regulatory complexities so you can focus on creating the best product for your customers.
Our unique Banking-as-a-Service platform has some of the most advanced RESTful APIs in the European market. Our APIs are designed for scalability and international expansion.

Our entire banking infrastructure is cloud-based. This way we create exceptional banking experiences for our partners' customers. We are leading the development of innovative and truly digital financial products.

svg.content: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="48" height="48" viewBox="0 0 48 48"><g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd"><path d="M0 0h48v48H0z"/><path stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M9.63 17 1 24.5 9.63 32m28.74-15L47 24.5 38.37 32m-5.74-11.25H17.29m15.34 3.75H17.29m9.59 3.75h-9.59"/></g></svg>

childMarkdownRemark.html: With our smart API accessible services, you can easily manage the data of your users in real-time throughout the entire customer lifecycle: from onboarding to long-term support.
Take advantage of our state-of-the-art data mesh architecture to leverage essential data for decision making, planning, forecasting, and regulatory compliance.

testimonialAmex.authorTitle: Country Manager Germany, VP&GM Consumer Services, American Express

text.text: We got to know Solaris as a super cooperative partner, always solution-oriented, always targeted towards being successful together and producing something good for the customer.

testimonialVivid.authorTitle: Group General Counsel of Vivid Money

text.text: With Solarisâ€™ powerful Banking-as-a-Service platform, we found the optimal partner to conquer the European banking market. With its modular approach and an easy-to-integrate APIs, we reduced our time to market significantly and built a competitive offering at scale.
With its fast processes and well-established technology, Solaris is the ideal partner for us to implement our mission: to bring sustainable banking into the mainstream.

messages.mastercardCalculator.disclaimer: Please Note: Foreign exchange rates are specific to the date and time Mastercard processes the transaction which may be different from the transaction date. If your transaction is converted by the merchant or ATM operator, Mastercard foreign exchange rates will not apply. This will usually occur when you select to pay in your card's currency as opposed to the currency of the merchant or ATM.
